name: breeding
content:
breeding noun [U]
(ANIMALS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the keeping of animals or plants in order to breed from them: The family's business was horse-breeding. We used to keep pigs for breeding purposes.
the process in which animals have sex and produce young animals: The penguins' breeding season has begun.

breeding noun [U]
(BEHAVIOUR)
old-fashioned (also good breeding) polite and socially correct behaviour that someone has because they were taught it as a child
